name: Techmnter.GitHub.io
tagline: A repository for the women mentoring platform
body:
# Today's Star
![Women in Technology](http://www.techwell.com/sites/default/files/styles/story_page_display/public/stories/images/cropped_teasers/AlexaAngell/2014/women-only_2_0.jpg?itok=0kgcucl4)
[Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=86500225&authType=name&authToken=70gn&trk=mirror-profile-memberlist-photo)

### Welcome to TechMntor.
TechMntor is an initiative to empower the women in technology by connecting them to mentor who can help in the form of role modeling, support, and coaching.

### We Inspire
Every day we present a story of a woman just like you who has done wonders in field of technology.

### Looking for a mentor?
Check out our mentor-Mentee section, you will definitely find an expert to mentor you.

### Authors and Contributors
On March 3 2015 Burcu, Erasmia and Ritu founded TechMntor a platform to empower the women in tech to find mentor(s) .

### Support or Contact
Having trouble please contact BER@TechMntor.com.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
